src:
Fortsatt sifferkaos efter fredagens börshaveri
Stockholmsbörsen öppnade som normalt på måndagen men för börsdataleverantören Infront innebar Nasdaqs teknikproblem i fredags en strulig morgon.
04 Nov 2019, 08:58 by Jonathan Axelsson

text:
Continued digit chaos after Friday's stock market crash
The Stockholm Stock Exchange opened normally on Monday, but for the stock data provider Infront, Nasdaq's technology problems on Friday meant a glorious morning.
04 Nov 2019, 08:58 by Jonathan Axelsson
